When Scorned Arcanist enters, if a creature would enter under an opponent’s control this turn, instead exile that creature and that creature’s controller amasses Soldiers X, where X is that creature’s mana value.  [i](They put X +1/+1 counters on an Army they control. It’s also a Soldier. If they don’t control an Army, they create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
